title: 820 2936 b, No image
message:
Hey ,

Working on 2936 b motherboard with liquid damage near SMC, U7000 and some asshole touch on Q9425 + Q3880!!
u
initial the board don't turn on because PPBUS = 12.3V .. i replace U7000 + SMC and board was working well until i plug the battery. After that the board don't turn on and i noticed that U9480 was hot.. i found u9330 shorted replaced and short gone!! Now, the board start up normally but without image.. Not light on PENDRIVER!!

Q9425 + Q3880 replaced and i have a working board and test in diode mode all pin's and have same values compare with a working board!

PPBUS = 12.67V
PPVCCSA_S0_CPU = 0.9V
PP1V05_SUS - 1.05v
PP1V05_S0 - 1.055v
PPVCORE_S0_CPU 1.151

already replace a bios for new one with clean me no changes.. I don't touch in original one!

any suggestion ??

thank's

title: 820 2936 b, No image
message:
"board start up normally but without image"
What about backlight?

Surelly no USB activity?
Tested different RAM modules?

"PPVCORE_S0_CPU 1.151"
It should drop under 1V after few seconds; for a working board...

You must have corrosion problem still.

title: 820 2936 b, No image
message:
backing on this one, 

i'm sure, i don't have activity on USB! Already tested diferent rams on 2 ram_modules! 

PPVCORE_S0_CPU 1.151V don't drop to 1V ... keep on 1.151V. 

already put the board on ultrasonic!! but no change. you have more ideas ?? 

thanks

title: 820 2936 b, No image
message:
So something happened when connected battery.
Battery bus is common for U7000 and SMC; one of them could be bad now.
Test resistance to ground at SCL/SDA, and voltage too (battery connected).
Does it charge the battery?

title: 820 2936 b, No image
message:
Ya, this one before i touch boot's well to operation system but with the battery problem! 

SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SCL - 425v DIODE MODE 
SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA - 425v DIODE MODE 

I have 11.54V on PPVBAT_G3H_CONN with charger connect! It's normal PPBUS_G3H goes to 11.54V with battery and charger connect ? 

i think the battery is charging, the light goes orange when i plug the battery and when i take off the charger the fan keep working!!

title: 820 2936 b, No image
message:
PPBUS_G3H should increase bit a bit, if battery is charging.
Once battery is fully charged (100%), PPBUS_G3H should go to 12.5V and magsafe switch back to green..
